entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is a teacher at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. He is described as looking paler than usual and angrier than Harry.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character in the story. He is described as standing up again after being on his knees, with a heart thumping wildly.

entities.name: cedric
entities.description: Cedric is mentioned as someone Harry saw dead in the graveyard.

entities.name: dark lord
entities.description: The Dark Lord is a powerful and evil entity that Snape mentions as a threat to Harry.

relationships.description: Snape is angry with Harry for not being able to control his emotions.
Snape warns Harry that he will be easy prey for the Dark Lord if he continues to let his emotions get the better of him.
